content.raw:
In segway 1.2.0 (bitbucket dev version), I get an error creating input.master (traceback below). The input.master file is created in the params directory, but is empty.

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/bin/segway", line 9, in <module>
    load_entry_point('segway==1.2.0', 'console_scripts', 'segway')()
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/lib/python2.7/segway-1.2.0-py2.7.egg/segway/run.py", line 2519, in main
    return runner()
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/lib/python2.7/segway-1.2.0-py2.7.egg/segway/run.py", line 2347, in __call__
    self.run(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/lib/python2.7/segway-1.2.0-py2.7.egg/segway/run.py", line 2323, in run
    self.run_train()
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/lib/python2.7/segway-1.2.0-py2.7.egg/segway/run.py", line 1912, in run_train
    dst_filenames = self.setup_train()
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/lib/python2.7/segway-1.2.0-py2.7.egg/segway/run.py", line 1875, in setup_train
    self.params_dirpath, self.clobber)
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/lib/python2.7/segway-1.2.0-py2.7.egg/segway/_util.py", line 149, in __call__
    *args, **kwargs)
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/lib/python2.7/segway-1.2.0-py2.7.egg/segway/_util.py", line 425, in save_template
    save_substituted_resource(filename, resource, mapping)
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/lib/python2.7/segway-1.2.0-py2.7.egg/segway/_util.py", line 408, in save_substituted_resource
    text = tmpl.substitute(mapping)
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/python/2.7.6/lib/python2.7/string.py", line 172, in substitute
    return self.pattern.sub(convert, self.template)
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/python/2.7.6/lib/python2.7/string.py", line 165, in convert
    return '%s' % (val,)
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/lib/python2.7/segway-1.2.0-py2.7.egg/segway/input_master.py", line 236, in __str__
    return make_spec(self.type_name, self.generate_objects())
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/lib/python2.7/segway-1.2.0-py2.7.egg/segway/input_master.py", line 79, in make_spec
    items = list(iterable)
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/lib/python2.7/segway-1.2.0-py2.7.egg/segway/input_master.py", line 483, in generate_objects
    dirichlet_table = self.make_dirichlet_table()
  File "/vol1/software/modules-python/segway/1.2.0/lib/python2.7/segway-1.2.0-py2.7.egg/segway/input_master.py", line 467, in make_dirichlet_table
    probs = self.make_dense_cpt_segCountDown_seg_segTransition()
AttributeError: 'DirichletTabParamSpec' object has no attribute 'make_dense_cpt_segCountDown_seg_segTransition'
```

content.html:
In segway 1.2.0 (bitbucket dev version), I get an error creating input.master (traceback below). The input.master file is created in the params directory, but is empty.

Traceback (most recent call last):
